header.title: Our Products
header.description: Carefully crafted skincare essentials for healthy, glowing skin.

hero.title: Passion & Love for Natural Beauty
hero.description: Discover skincare designed to support your skin’s natural balance. Thoughtfully formulated with effective ingredients, our products help hydrate, renew, and maintain healthy-looking skin—making everyday skincare simple and comfortable.

catalog.title: Designed for Skin That Deserves Care

homeAbout.label: a bit
homeAbout.title: About Us
homeAbout.description: We believe that healthy skin starts with simple and thoughtful care. Our products are formulated with carefully selected ingredients to support your skin’s natural balance, delivering effective results without unnecessary complexity. We focus on creating skincare that feels comfortable, reliable, and easy to incorporate into your daily routine.

header.title: Our Passion for Thoughtful Skincare
header.subtitle: We believe skincare should feel simple, comfortable, and effective. Our journey began with a focus on supporting the skin’s natural balance through gentle and thoughtfully formulated products.

section1.title: Rooted in Simplicity
section1.content: Foundational Simplicity Our brand is built on the idea that skincare doesn't have to be complicated. By focusing on essential ingredients and gentle formulations, we help you start your skincare journey safely and comfortably. Our products are specifically designed for young skin with lightweight, hassle-free formulas that are safe for daily use. We want skincare to be fun and accessible to everyone.

section2.title: Discover Skincare Designed for Everyday Comfort
section2.content: Our mission is to help everyone achieve healthy and glowing skin through safe, natural, and responsibly crafted skincare products.

section3.title: Our Commitment
section3.content: Our Commitment We are committed to providing high-quality skincare with safe and effective formulas. Every detail is carefully considered to ensure our products are safe and high-quality. They are developed through in-depth research and using carefully selected, dermatologically tested ingredients. We believe that healthy skin is the foundation of self-confidence, and we are here to accompany you on every step of your skincare journey.

values.title: Our Values
content: Carefully developed formulas designed to respect your skin’s natural balance.
Each ingredient is selected with purpose, focusing on comfort and effectiveness.
Skincare that fits seamlessly into your daily routine.

homeContact.label: CONTACT
homeContact.title: Let’s Work Together
homeContact.description: We are open to new opportunities, partnerships, and project discussions. If you are looking for a reliable team to collaborate with or would like to explore how we can work together, feel free to reach out. We believe that successful projects are built through trust, communication, and a shared vision.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have questions about our products or need help choosing the right skincare? We're here to help you.

form.title: Get In Touch
form.description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.brandText: Care For Your Skin – Naturally, Every Day.

q1.question: Is this product safe for beginners in skincare?
q1.answer: Our products are formulated with essential and gentle ingredients, making them safe for beginners who are just starting their skincare routine. Our lightweight formulas are comfortable for daily use.

q2.question: Is this product suitable for sensitive skin?
q2.answer: Our products are developed with attention to the skin’s natural balance and have been dermatologically tested to minimize the risk of irritation.

q3.question: Can the product be used every day?
q3.answer: Yes, all of our products are designed for daily use with lightweight and practical formulas.

q4.question: Is this product suitable for young skin?
q4.answer: Our products are specifically formulated for young skin, focusing on comfort and basic skincare needs.

s1.title: 1. Introduction
s1.content: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and services.

s2.title: 2. Information We Collect
s2.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other information that you voluntarily provide through contact forms or newsletter subscriptions.

s3.title: 3. Use of Information
s3.content: The information we collect is used to provide services, improve the quality of our website, and send updates or information relevant to our products.

s4.title: 4. Data Protection
s4.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

s5.title: 5. Cookies
s5.content: Our website may use cookies to enhance the user experience. Cookies help us understand how the website is used so we can make continuous improvements.

s6.title: 6. Links to Other Websites
s6.content: Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy policies or content of third-party websites.

s7.title: 7. Policy Changes
s7.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the latest update date.

s8.title: 8. Contact Us
s8.content: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email at support@neatural.com.

s1.title: 1. Introduction
s1.content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by the following Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

s2.title: 2. Website Use
s2.content: This website is provided for personal and non-commercial use. You agree not to use this website for any unlawful activities or activities that may harm other parties.

s3.title: 3. Product Information
s3.content: We strive to display product information as accurately as possible. However, we do not guarantee that descriptions, images, or other content are completely free from errors.

s4.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
s4.content: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and designs, is our property and is protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized use without written permission is prohibited.

s5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
s5.content: We are not responsible for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of or inability to use this website.

s6.title: 6. Service Changes
s6.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or update any part of the website without prior notice.

s7.title: 7. Changes to Terms & Conditions
s7.content: These Terms & Conditions may be updated from time to time. Changes will take effect immediately after being published on this page.

s8.title: 8. Governing Law
s8.content: These Terms & Conditions are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Indonesia.

s9.title: 9. Contact Us
s9.content: If you have any questions regarding these Terms & Conditions, please contact us via email at support@neatural.com.
